exm.mng: Never forget national humiliation, refers to Mukden railway incident of 18th September 1931 九一八事變|九一八事变 and subsequent Japanese annexation of Manchuria
What you don't want done to you, don't do to others. (idiom, from the Confucian analects), Do as you would be done by., Do not do to others what you would not have them do to you.
exm.pyn: jǐ suǒ bù yù , wù shī yú rén

exm.mng: No smoking, Please do not smoke
Do not do to others what you do not wish others to do to you (Confucius)
exm.pyn: yǐ suǒ bù yù , wù shī yú rén

exm.mng: (of one's political views) to prefer left rather than right (idiom during the Cultural Revolution)
to put something aside for the time being (idiom)
to continue to respect ancient canons (idiom)
same as 寧缺毋濫|宁缺毋滥[ning4 que1 wu2 lan4]
What you don't want done to you, don't do to others. (idiom, from the Confucian analects), Do as you would be done by., Do not do to others what you would not have them do to you.
exm.pyn: jǐ suǒ bù yù , wù shī yú rén

exm.mng: variant of 少安毋躁[shao3 an1 wu2 zao4]
don't forget your friends when you become rich
exm.pyn: gǒu fù guì , wù xiāng wàng
